cell.name: Containment Cell
cell.description: You are in a cold, concrete cell. The heavy iron door is slightly ajar, and a faint, rhythmic scraping sound echoes from the hall. A single, flickering light bulb casts long shadows across a hard cot and a small, stained table.

details.cot: A simple metal frame with a thin, uncomfortable mattress. This is where you sleep.
details.table: A small metal table bolted to the floor. There's a half-empty coffee cup on it.
details.light bulb: It flickers erratically, threatening to plunge the room into darkness at any moment.

hallway_a.name: Dim Hallway
hallway_a.description: You are in a long, dimly lit hallway. A guard stands by the east wall, alert and armed. The scraping sound is louder here. To the west is your cell. The hallway continues to the east.

hallway_b.name: Dreadful Hallway
hallway_b.description: The hallway continues. The scraping is very close now. You feel a sense of dread. There is a door to the north and the hallway continues east. A broom is propped up against the wall.

storage_room.name: Storage Room
storage_room.description: You've entered a small storage room. It's filled with dusty boxes and discarded equipment. It smells of mold and decay.

details.boxes: They are mostly empty, but some contain broken machine parts and old uniforms.
details.equipment: Rusted tools and pieces of unidentifiable machinery lie in a heap.

control_room.name: Security Control Room
control_room.description: This appears to be a security control room. Most of the monitors are shattered. One flickering screen shows a blurry image of a statue-like figure. A security terminal sits on a console, and a keycard is lying next to it.

details.monitors: Dozens of screens, all smashed except for one. The floor is covered in glass.
details.screen: The single working screen shows a static-filled, monochrome image of a concrete room containing a strange, vaguely humanoid statue.
details.console: A large control console covered in buttons and switches, all unresponsive. A security terminal is built into it.
